Software.Name: Operating System
Betriebssystem
Software.Description: Das Betriebssystem ist das größte Stück Software in Software Inc. Die meiste Software benötigt ein Betriebssystem für die Ausführung. Wenn die Menschen mehr Betriebssysteme einer Linie kaufen, werden sie auch mehr Software kaufen.

Feature.Name: Terminal
Terminal
Feature.Description: Das Terminal ist die klassische textbasierte Schnittstelle zwischen dem Betriebssystem und den Benutzer.

Feature.Name: GUI
GUI
Feature.Description: Durch das Graphical User Interface können Benutzer das visualisieren, was sie gerade tun. Dadurch sind sie nicht mehr an nur eine Zeile bei der Eingabe gebunden.

Feature.Name: Keyboard input
Tastatureingabe
Feature.Description: Es hat Buchstaben, Zahlen und andere wichtige Dinge.

Feature.Name: Plug'n'Play
Plug'n'Play
Feature.Description: Stecken Sie etwas in den Computer, und lassen Sie das Betriebssystem den Rest erledigen.

Feature.Name: Multitasking
Multitasking
Feature.Description: Let your users pretend they can multitask by having several applications open at any one time.

Feature.Name: Multithreading
Multithreading
Feature.Description: Multithreading allows the Operating System to run mulitple threads at the same time by continually switching between them intelligently, speeding up applications and confusing developers to no end.

Feature.Name: Networking
Networking
Feature.Description: How will anonymous people troll each other all over the world without this handy feature?

Feature.Name: Auto-update
Auto-update
Feature.Description: Keep bugs and malware out, while annoying users with broken drivers and sudden restarts.

Feature.Name: 64-bit
64-bit
Feature.Description: Doubles the size of bits per register, allowing for bigger numbers, more memory, larger files, the answer to life, etc.

Feature.Name: PC speaker
PC Lautsprecher
Feature.Description: Für alle Ihre Piep-Bedürfnisse

Feature.Name: HD audio
HD Audio
Feature.Description: Wie 8-bit Audio, nur mit mehr bits

Software.Name: Visual Tool
Visuelles Tool
Software.Description: The visual tool is for creating visual art, whether it be 3D animations or pixelart.

Feature.Name: Image viewing
Bildbetrachtung
Feature.Description: You have to at least be able to actually see images

Feature.Name: Image editing
Bildbearbeitung
Feature.Description: Allow the user to alter pixels so they can improve all their cat pictures

Software.Name: Audio Tool
Audio Tool
Software.Description: Das Audio-Tool ist für die Aufnahme von Musik und das Mischen der Musik mit Soundeffekten zuständig.

Software.Name: Game Engine
Game Engine
Software.Description: The game engine is what powers a game. It contains everything needed for a game, except for the creativity.

Feature.Name: Text-based
Text-basiert
Feature.Description: Make the player type a novel to complete the game

Feature.Name: Multiplayer
Multiplayer
Feature.Description: Facilitate the screaming of obscenities by teenagers from all over the world

Software.Name: Webbased Game
Browsergame
Software.Description: Webbased games are not bound to any operating system, but suffer the conequences of not being able to fully utilize the underlying system.

Feature.Name: HTML based
HTML based
Feature.Description: Spreadsheet games! Yaaay!

Feature.Name: 3D graphics
3D Grafik
Feature.Description: Add that third dimension to your webgame.

Software.Name: Antivirus
Antivirus
Software.Description: Protecting computers from digital troublemakers since it became profitable to do so.

Feature.Name: User interface
Benutzeroberfläche
Feature.Description: Make it easy for the user to manage their virus handling

Feature.Name: Background scan
Hintergrundscan
Feature.Description: Scan for viruses in the background causing hilarious file locks randomly

Feature.Name: Mail scan
E-Mail Scan
Feature.Description: There's always room for enlargement

Feature.Name: Virus database
Virus Datenbank
Feature.Description: Automagically keep your user's virus definitions up to date

Feature.Name: QA
QS
Feature.Description: Verwenden Sie die Qualitätssicherung, um ein stabileres Produkt zu erhalten oder auftretende Fehler zu beheben
